channel.title: Ip-banning?

item.title: Ip-banning?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“jailed, post:3, topic:368698”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=464838.msg3399003#msg3399003 date=1289744432]
Just do like,

if (connectingHost.contains("bb.netvision.net.il")) {
s.close();
}

[/quote]

tyvm! ill try it out

edit: that code gave errors, but i rewrote it to this:

if (host.contains("bb.netvision.net.il")) { System.out.println("That noob who uses cheat client tried to log on... rofl"); return false; }

and then it worked.[/quote]

Strange, my server class must use different variables etc from yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Ip-banning?

@jailed wrote:

if (connectingHost.contains("bb.netvision.net.il")) { s.close(); } [/quote]

tyvm! ill try it out

edit: that code gave errors, but i rewrote it to this:

if (host.contains("bb.netvision.net.il")) { System.out.println("That noob who uses cheat client tried to log on... rofl"); return false; }

and then it worked.

item.title: Ip-banning?
item.dc:creator: @jailed jailed
item.description:
@jailed wrote:

well, lately ive been having trouble with this guy who keeps changing his ip :rolleyes:
hes no threath, since all he does is using a cheat client… but he is getting irritating to the other players.
ive ipbanned him several times, but he change his ip…
well, his ip’s looks like this;

93-173-3-222.bb.netvision.net.il 93-173-3-222.bb.netvision.net.il 93-172-187-77.bb.netvision.net.il 93-173-188-208.bb.netvision.net.il

and since all his ips contains “bb.netvision.net.il”, i was wondering if i somehow could “ipban” his router or w\e it is… by using the same method thats used for rejecting players who has their ip in ipbans.txt…

(in server.java)that method looks like this:

if (checkLog("ipbans", host)) { System.out.println("They are in ip ban list!"); return false; // ip ban added by bakatool } return true; }

and if in any help, im using 317, delta.

Read full topic
